Reviews.Content: booked des nations saint germain base attended french month stands wonderful manager valerie greeted arrived extremely helpful throughout stay helped print tickets mail postcards answered questions tiny expected 3 star paris hotel clean bathrooms sized ours updated offstreet easily accommodated safety concern bathtubs mats grab bars european tubs risky getting plus size person youll trouble taking bath tubs deep narrow tiny size closet drawer space allows unpack stow theres stow suitcases carryons easily air conditioning fine quickly cooled beds pillows comfortable slept rock breakfast fairly typical croissants toast scrambled eggs sausage undercooked bacon plus cereal yogurt cheese beverages location easy walking distance separate metro stations youre short downhill stroll blvd st germain attractions recommend hotel tourist stay left bank easy access offer
